Name: ViRo Live Studio
About the game: In ViRo Live Studio , anyone can stream online as a professional V-Tuber or LewdTuber! Full-body motion capture with popular affordable VR and motion capture hardware. Support for Oculus, HTC, and Valve VR HMDs and controllers or full body tracking with Steam trackers and full face-tracking with an iPhone and our companion Viro Live Face Portal application native Vroid Studio VRM support , or you can import your custom made characters, no limits! Built on the engine/software behind Vex Ruby, the world's most advanced virtual cam performer. Support for 100+ popular haptic sex toys including Lovense, Kiiroo, Handy, and many others. seamless OBS integration. Simulated facial tracking with your VR HMD microphone Optional advanced iPhone face-capture with our companion iOS ViRo Live Face Portal app: -live-face-portal/id1623942800 Extensive Features for Advanced Users Powerful console interface - Change environments, models/outfits, props, sound effects, particle effects and more in real-time with our advanced command line interface. Streams can be via iPad or other tablet-based control panels for easy real-time control and triggering during live production using an iPad or tablet. Chaturbate API Integration allows for custom 'room goal' and tip-triggered events Support for our optional low-fatigue face-capture rig for extended live performances. With hassle free full body tracking and the option to choose full range face tracking through our iOS app or simulated face tracking when using VR with expression controls, you’ll have more time to focus on your stream. The way you perform is completely up to you . Express yourself with just a microphone using simulated lip syncing , or go all out with full body and face tracking in real-time! You can perform in ViRo Live Studio with: Full Body Tracking with HTC Vive Trackers (x3 Needed) Full Face Tracking with ViRo Live Face Portal for iOS Full Face Tracking with HTC Vive Pro Eye with additional face tracker Upper body performance with any VR headset Simulated Lip Sync with just a mic ViRo Live Studio lets you control every aspect of your broadcast, even in VR, such as: Avatar Background Visuals Lighting Camera Color Processing Menus and controls are hidden from viewers so they only see what you want them to see. This works by sending the output directly to OBS. ViRo Live Studio also includes a Unity3D Editor Project with tools to help you make your own characters, props, backgrounds, sounds, cameras, ... the list goes on. Export your creation as a Bundle for easy access in ViRo Live Studio We want you to be able to make your broadcast match your unique vision. ViRo Live Studio has a fully open console command / user asset system so you can create any scenario you dream of. You can also create full 3D scenes, props, animations, and more with our included Unity project . The app is built on the foundation created for Vex Ruby , the world’s most advanced VR camgirl . It is designed from ground up with professional livestreaming in mind. By performers, for performers. ViRo Live Studio offers direct integration with adult streaming support (adult toys, tips, chat window, and more) for all you LewdTubers out there. Of course, Adult features are completely optional.
